description:
In this video, you will learn how to deploy Wagtail, an open source content management system built on Django, to Google App Engine’s new second-generation Python runtime.

Setting Up a Python Development Environment →  http://bit.ly/2CDdn3N 
Install the ‘gcloud’ Google Cloud SDK → http://bit.ly/2QAbYUn 
Install the Cloud SQL Proxy → http://bit.ly/2SmPRNL 
Storing secrets →  http://bit.ly/2AjwuON  
Google App Engine Python 3 Standard Environment Documentation → http://bit.ly/2PIql3t 

Stay up to date by subscribing to the Google Cloud Platform Channel → http://bit.ly/GCloudPlatform
title: Deploying a Content Management System to App Engine with Python 3
